snippet: Confronted by protests that have left a dozen people reported dead and driven thousands to flee the country, President Pierre Nkurunziza said that if he is re-elected next month, he will not run for office again.
abstract: Burundi's Pres Pierre Nkurunziza, in face of protests that have plunged nation into worst crisis since its civil war, says he will not run for office again if he is re-elected in June.
lead_paragraph: Confronted by protests that have left a dozen people reported dead and driven thousands to flee the country, President Pierre Nkurunziza said that if he is re-elected next month, he will not run for office again.

headline.main: Burundi: President Says Third Term Would Be His Last
headline.print_headline: Africa; Burundi: President Says Third Term Would Be His Last
